title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials via the registration form.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Fill in valid user details including email, password, and any required fields
Submit the registration form
Verify registration is successful and user is redirected or notified appropriately

title: User Registration with Existing Email
description: Ensure registration fails when the user attempts to sign up with an email that already exists.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter an email address that is already registered
Fill out other required fields
Submit the registration form
Verify that an appropriate error message is shown and registration is blocked

title: User Login Success
description: Check that an existing user can log in using valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
Verify that user is authenticated and redirected to main application page

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and displays an error message for invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid email and/or password
Click the login button
Check that login is rejected with correct error message

title: Session Management After Login
description: Confirm that user session persists after login and remains active across page refreshes.

steps.description: Log in successfully with valid credentials
Reload or navigate through authenticated pages
Verify session remains active and user stays logged in
Log out
Reload page after logout
Verify session is cleared and user is no longer authenticated

title: Access Company Management Without Authentication
description: Ensure users who are not authenticated cannot access the company management pages or data.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to the company management section without logging in
Confirm that access is denied or user is redirected to login page

title: Load Public Home Page for Visitor
description: Verify that the public home page loads correctly and displays accurate content for non-authenticated visitors.

steps.description: Access the app without logging in
Verify that the public home page is rendered with all key UI elements
Confirm accessibility of all public content and main application value propositions

title: Blog Posts Load and Display Correctly
description: Ensure blog posts section loads all posts correctly and displays latest published content with titles, excerpts, and timestamps.

steps.description: Navigate to the blog section
Verify the list of blog posts is displayed with correct titles, dates, and excerpts
Select a blog post to view details
Confirm full blog content is rendered correctly

title: API Integration Handles Successful Data Fetch
description: Verify that the application correctly fetches data from APIs (e.g., authentication status, company data, blog content) and displays it.

steps.description: Trigger data fetches via UI or hooks (e.g., login status check, company list, blog posts)
Verify that the returned data is properly displayed in the UI and matches backend data

title: API Integration Handles Backend Errors Gracefully
description: Test that the frontend handles API failures (e.g., network errors, server errors) by showing appropriate error messages and fallback UI.

steps.description: Simulate backend API errors during data fetch or update
Check that user-visible error messages or notifications are displayed
Confirm the app remains stable and does not crash

title: Middleware Request Processing
description: Test middleware functions correctly intercept requests, modifies or redirects as intended, and handles unauthenticated access properly.

steps.description: Send requests as unauthenticated user to protected routes
Verify middleware blocks or redirects unauthorized access
Send requests as authenticated user
Confirm middleware allows passage and proper processing

title: Theme Switching Applies Across Application
description: Validate that changing the application theme updates styling consistently across all pages and components.

steps.description: Trigger the theme switch (e.g., light to dark mode) via UI control
Verify that colors, backgrounds, and UI elements update accordingly throughout the app
Navigate between pages after theme change
Confirm theme selection is retained and consistent
